General.Name: Soc Centrale Bois Scieries Manche SA
General.Description: Societe Centrale des Bois et Scieries de la Manche engages in the ownership, management, and lease of real estate properties in France. It leases offices, business properties, mixed activity locations, and residences. The company is based in Paris, France.
General.Address: 12 rue Godot de Mauroy, Paris, France, 75009
